title: An Arizona Morgue Grows Crowded
body:
Pima County, Arizona, morgue is running out of space as number of illegal immigrants found dead in the deserts 
around Tucson has soared during heat wave; July is on track to be worst month for such deaths in five years; 
tougher enforcement measures have pushed smugglers and illegal immigrants to take their chances on more 
remote areas and trails than ever before, and many are unprepared for journey; photos.

Graphic

 

Photograph
